tool_description: The WebKnox text processing API lets you process (natural) language texts. You can detect the text's language, the quality of the writing, find entity mentions, tag part-of-speech, extract dates, extract locations, or determine the sentiment of the text.
name: Text Processing
title: Text Processing

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: Detect the language of a natural language text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text for which the language should be determined.
required_parameters.default: This is a sample English sentence.

api_list.name: Detect Part-of-Speech
api_list.description: Tag a given text with part-of-speech tags (POS tags).

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text for which the POS tags should be found.
required_parameters.default: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

api_list.name: Extract Locations
api_list.description: Extract names of locations in the given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text from which locations should be extracted.
required_parameters.default: The capital of France is Paris.

api_list.name: Extract Dates
api_list.description: Extract dates from a given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text from which dates should be extracted.

api_list.name: Extract Entities
api_list.description: Extract entities such as movies or people in a given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text in which entities should be detected.
required_parameters.default: This text contains entities such as the singer John Hiatt and the actor Jim Carry.

api_list.name: Detect Errors
api_list.description: Detect spelling errors in the text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text that should be auto-corrected.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the given text.

api_list.name: Split Sentences.
api_list.description: Split a given text into sentences.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text to split into sentences.
required_parameters.default: This is a text, Mr. One is 1.8 m tall. And another sentence.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The language of the text. Currently English (en) and German (de) are supported.

api_list.name: Summarize Text
api_list.description: Extract a summary of a text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text which should be summarized.
required_parameters.default: A text which should be summarized.

optional_parameters.name: keepRatio
optional_parameters.description: The ratio of the text that should be kept.

api_list.name: Detect Sentiment
api_list.description: Detect the sentiment (positive or negative) of a given text. The detection works for English and German texts.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text for which the sentiment should be detected.
required_parameters.default: I love music by John Hiatt.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the given text (en=English, de=German).

optional_parameters.name: contextWords
optional_parameters.description: Optionally consider only sentences that contain a context word for the sentiment detection.
